attributes.action: The NHS must continue to supply gluten free bread and flour.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is considering withdrawing prescriptions for essential gluten free staples such as bread and gluten free flour. The average cost of a gluten free loaf of equivalent weight is over three times the cost of an ordinary loaf. Avoiding gluten is essential if you have coeliac disease and not a lifestyle choice
attributes.background: Coeliacs should not be penalised financially due to their condition.
